verses.verse: O clap <S%H8628><s%> your hands <S%H3709><s%>, all you people <S%H5971><s%>; shout <S%H7321><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of triumph <S%H7440><s%>.
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> most high <S%H5945><s%> is terrible <S%H3372><s%>; he is a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> over all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He shall subdue <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> under us <S%H3816><s%>, and the nations under our feet <S%H7272><s%>.
He shall choose <S%H977><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us <S%H1347><s%>, the excellency of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> whom he loved <S%H157><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is gone up <S%H5927><s%> with a shout <S%H8643><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a trumpet <S%H7782><s%>.
Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to God <S%H430><s%>, sing praises <S%H2167><s%>: sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto our King <S%H4428><s%>, sing praises <S%H2167><s%>.
For God <S%H430><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: sing you praises <S%H2167><s%> with understanding <S%H7919><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> reigns <S%H4427><s%> over the heathen <S%H1471><s%>: God <S%H430><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> upon the throne <S%H3678><s%> of his holiness <S%H6944><s%>.

The princes <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> are gathered together <S%H622><s%>, even the people <S%H5971><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>: for the shields <S%H4043><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> belong unto God <S%H430><s%>: he is greatly <S%H3966><s%> exalted <S%H5927><s%>.
